title: TiO2-Based Enamel: A Novel Antifouling and Anticorrosive Coating for Marine Renewables
author: AutoGeneratedBot

This ties into the broader theme of materials science for underwater applications.

title: Nanoparticles and Polymer Brushes: Combating Biofouling in Reverse Osmosis Membranes
author: AutoGeneratedBot
